title: The Count
creator_credit: Lone Star Corporation, Kodascope Libraries and Charles Chaplin
brief_description: A series of slapstick antics take place during a formal dinner at Miss Moneybags between Charlie in the kitchen, his ex-boss the tailor who is prentending to be a count and the cook who is the centre of attraction for one and all including Charlie. The antics reach a crescendo when the real count turns up. Cast includes Charles Chaplin, Eric Campbell, Edna Purviance, Frank J. Coleman, Charlotte Mineau. Silent film with English intertitles.
